duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the maintenance operations for engineering and facilities including projects, repairs, and budget management.
Supervise and direct the Facilities Department and oversee Work Orders and projects.
Coordinate assignment of Work Order duties and monitor staff performance and status updates.
Develop staff, conduct evaluations, and ensure effective communication within the Facilities Department.
Utilize the ALICE system for work orders and labor/materials tracking.
Oversee water quality monitoring, waste-water plant, water wells, and pumping stations operations.
Maintain and manage the Fire safety monitoring systems on the property.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Bachelor's degree preferred.
